function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Pandemic events impacting global economies","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Unpredictability and exogeneity of pandemic events","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Loss of industry-level details due to country-level data analysis","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Data underestimates true sales figures and installed base of robots","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Lack of robot data beyond 2018 limits the analysis of pandemic impact on robot impact","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of mathematical models and calculations","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Data privacy and confidentiality","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Insufficient documentation and attribution","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Pandemic episodes impacting labor market","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Automation leading to inequality and unemployment","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Disproportionate impact on low-skilled workers, women, youths, and marginalized individuals","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Acceleration of robot adoption displacing low-skilled workers","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Challenges in acquiring new and challenging skill sets leading to a persistent increase in dropouts","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Pandemics leading to increases in the gini coefficient and inequality","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Uneven impact of robots on workers with different skill levels","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Dependent on country fixed effects and global business cycle","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Pandemics increasing robot adoption","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on changes in gini
